#!/bin/bash

# Change directory to /home/batan/10/menu/scripts/
cd /home/batan/10/menu/scripts/

# Get the list of scripts in the directory
scripts=$(ls)

# Display the list of scripts
select script in $scripts; do
    # Execute the user-selected script
   sudo -u batan bash /home/batan/10/menu/select/$script
    break
    #leave the command 'break' out for the repeat

done
